summary: Build a beautiful landing page for the Flubby meme coin (ticker: FLUB) with an emotional, motivational "never give up / keep trying" theme that helps viewers connect with Flubby as a character.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Square illustration of Flubby looking determined with a warm uplifting background (flubby-gallery-01.dim_1200x1200.png)
- Square illustration of Flubby looking tired-but-still-trying, cozy emotional lighting (flubby-gallery-02.dim_1200x1200.png)
- Square illustration of Flubby getting back up after a stumble, hopeful mood (flubby-gallery-03.dim_1200x1200.png)
- Square illustration of Flubby cheering a small win, celebratory but gentle tone (flubby-gallery-04.dim_1200x1200.png)
- Square illustration of Flubby quietly practicing again, calm focused vibe (flubby-gallery-05.dim_1200x1200.png)
- Square illustration of Flubby with a supportive community vibe, warm and friendly (flubby-gallery-06.dim_1200x1200.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page, mobile-first landing page for the Flubby meme coin (ticker: FLUB) that centers on Flubby as a character “trying his best,” with an emotional, motivational theme: “Never give up. Keep trying.” All user-facing copy must be in English and written to help visitors empathize with Flubby.

Define and apply one distinct visual theme consistently across the landing page (color palette, typography pairings, spacing, button styles, and section layout) that feels uplifting and emotional (do not use a generic corporate look).

Add a hero section that introduces Flubby and the core message, including: a strong headline, a short supportive subheadline, and a prominent call-to-action area (CTAs can be non-functional placeholders if no URLs are provided).
Add a “Flubby’s Story / Manifesto” section written in an emotional, motivational tone (never give up / keep trying), designed for readability (line length, spacing, and hierarchy).

Add a “FLUB at a glance” section that displays only confirmed facts from the user request (Flubby, ticker FLUB) and uses safe placeholders for any missing details (e.g., contract address, chain, supply) without inventing values.

Generate and integrate custom static images for the landing page (hero character + supporting visuals). Store them as static assets and render them directly from the frontend (do not fetch images from the backend).
Update the “Join Community” call-to-action in the Closing CTA section so it includes a working X (Twitter) link pointing to https://x.com/ar94595.
Add a new “Flubby Gallery” section to the landing page that displays multiple Flubby images with relatable, motivational captions users can connect with.
Integrate the newly generated Flubby gallery images into the frontend as static assets and reference them from the new gallery section.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a beautiful web/landing page for the Flubby meme coin (FLUB) with an emotional, motivational "never give up / keep trying" theme centered on Flubby trying his best.
Add an X (Twitter) link under the “Join Community” section pointing to https://x.com/ar94595.
Add a “Flubby Gallery” section with more Flubby images, each paired with relatable captions that help people connect with Flubby.
